entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 16 January 2023
